title: Fight Club (1999) [Supplementary Audio for Yify Rips]
description:
Those who downloaded 720p and 1080p version of Fight Club (1999) by Yify and found the audio having spontaneous annoying clicking sound, this torrent is for them. 
I got the original 5.1 and 2.0 audio for this version from external source. I muxed it with my copy and it worked like charm, So anyone interested in having the audio too, please feel free to download.


Specifications:

Audio 1: Stereo 2.0
Format : AAC
Format/Info : Advanced Audio Codec
Format profile : LC
Duration : 2h 19mn
Bit rate mode : Variable
Bit rate : 96.0 Kbps
Maximum bit rate : 124 Kbps
Channel count : 2 channels
Channel positions : Front: L R
Sampling rate : 48.0 KHz
Stream size : 95.5 MiB
Writing library : Nero AAC codec 1.5.4.0

Audio 2: Surround 5.1
Format : AAC
Format/Info : Advanced Audio Codec
Format profile : LC
Duration : 2h 19mn
Bit rate mode : Variable
Bit rate : 288 Kbps
Maximum bit rate : 387 Kbps
Channel(s) : 6 channels
Channel positions : Front: L C R, Side: L R, LFE
Sampling rate : 48.0 KHz
Stream size : 284 MiB
Writing library : Nero AAC codec 1.5.4.0



Use YAMB to join the audio to the MP4 video file. Or use mkvmerge if you don't bother having mkv videos.

Note: Please seed after downloading. My bandwidth is limited, so I wouldn't be able to seed for long. Seed, share and help others to download. Thank you.
